verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, Beautiful Saviour
God of all Majesty
Risen king

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lamb of God
Holy and righteous
Blessed redeemer
Bright morning star

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
All the heavens shout your praise
All creation bow to wor---ship You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
How wonderful, how beautiful
Name above every name, ex----alted high
How wonderful, how beautiful
Jesus your name, name above every name, Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: I will sing fore---ver, Jesus I love you, Jesus I love you x4
